au.org.intersect.dms.core.service
Interface DmsService

All Known Implementing Classes:
DmsServiceImpl
public interface DmsService

Client to DMS API.

Method Summary

ingest

Long ingest(String username,
            Long projectCode,
            String metadata,
            IngestParameter parameters)
Starts ingestion of the directory into DMS system (storage server and catalogue)

Parameters:
username - login name of the logged-in user
projectCode - project code this dataset will be linked to
metadata - metadata xml to associate with the dataset
parameters - ingestion params:
  • sourceConnectionId - source connection (instrument)
  • sourceDir - absolute path of the source directory
  • destinationConnectionId - destination connection
  • targetDir - absolute path of the target directory (storage server)
Returns:
job ID of the created ingestion job

copy

Long copy(String username,
          Integer sourceConnectionId,
          List<String> sources,
          Integer destinationConnectionId,
          String targetDir)
Starts copy of files and directories

Parameters:
sourceConnectionId - source connection
sources - list of absolute paths to copy
destinationConnectionId - destination connection
targetDir - absolute path of the target directory
Returns:
job ID of the created copy job
